meaningMnemonic: If you are able to <kanji>enter</kanji> the <kanji>gate</kanji> then you have gained <vocabulary>admission</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>entrance</vocabulary> to the facility.  Sometimes you do this to start an <vocabulary>apprenticeship</vocabulary>, where you get an <vocabulary>introduction</vocabulary> to some sweet new skills, like how to make an entrance.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
